summary:
**Grand Theft Auto IV** is a popular action-adventure game released in 2008. It's the sixth main game in the Grand Theft Auto series. The story follows Niko Bellic, a war veteran from Eastern Europe, who moves to a fictional city called Liberty City (based on New York). Niko tries to escape his past while dealing with dangerous criminals.

The game lets you explore Liberty City freely, which has three big islands and a nearby state called Alderney (based on New Jersey). You can play alone as Niko or join up to 32 players online for cooperative or competitive games. The game was very successful, selling over 25 million copies, but also caused some controversy due to its violence.
title: Grand Theft Auto IV
